author: Paradoxymoron
title: Cool
review: This is one simple baseplate that can be used for many things. It is X-large in size and came in one color-grey. I believe Lego thought these to be great sellers as I believe they Still them.it is great to have for a space collection since most space scenes are depicted on  grey, rocky asteroids or Planets. Great for any Lego collection. Try and get one.

author: Yoda____
title: esential
review: Any true lego fan should have this set or piece as it should be called it's perfect for building bases on or any building for that matter. For anyone getting a big bucket or box of bricks than they might as well get this but anyone with a lot of bricks from any set should get this to enhance their lego experience.
